name: Slug & The Mushrooms
description:
Slug & the Mushrooms is a project developed at the end of 2017 for the video game development course at DaVinci Multimedia School.

Developed by:

Nolasco Mauricio (Programming)
Gonzalez Brian (Programming)
Picco Franco (Level Design)
Bartolo Alejandro (Concept Art / Animation)

Music by: Criftmusic
